name: Xtreme Ketchup Farming
description:
Story

The skateboarding tomato, Giuseppe, has entered the ketchup market with his new and shiny AI, BOB. The two go on to make a lot of money from ketchup, now that I think about it, if Giuseppe is a tomato, and he's making ketchup...

there's also a bunch of evil potatoes, because potato and tomato rhyme

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Kickflip

Q - Swap Weapons

Left Click - Attack

Right Click - Water

How To Play
  • The AI will plant seeds on empty plots, and harvest plants that are done.
  • Stand on top of a plot, then right click to water it.
    • Get more water by skating over puddles.
  • If a potato hits the AI, you lose, so kill the potatoes.
    • Left click to attack.
    • Potatoes can only hurt the AI, as tomatoes don't get hurt by potatoes..
